effects: When you activate your Rage, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Barbarian level.
While your Rage is active, you can use a bonus action to grant these temporary hit points to yourself or a creature you can see within 30 feet, replacing any temporary hit points it already has.

feature_defs.trigger: when a creature you can see starts its turn within 30 feet of you while your Rage is active
effects: The target makes a Strength save (DC 8 + your Strength modifier + Proficiency Bonus) or is teleported to an unoccupied space you can see within 5 feet of you (or the nearest unoccupied space you can see).
After it teleports, you can reduce its speed to 0 until the end of the current turn.
During your turn, your reach increases by 10 feet with any melee weapon that has the Heavy or Versatile property.
When you hit with such a weapon on your turn, you can activate the Push or Topple mastery property in addition to another mastery property you’re using with that weapon.

feature_defs.trigger: when you activate your Rage or as a bonus action while your Rage is active
effects: You can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.
Once per Rage, you can increase the teleport range to 150 feet and bring up to six willing creatures within 10 feet; each teleports to an unoccupied space within 10 feet of your destination.
